name: Two Sides Story
description:
This is a Micro-Game.

I designed it for the people who want to propose to his loved one. Its simple, with barely any dificuty.

It has only one very small level, and the proposal level where......you propose.

So, if you want to declare your undying love to your future S.O. You can do it this way.

Credits where credits go:

https://soundcloud.com/jeffmatthews  For the music, its soo beautiful.

@hi_PixelFrog // https://pixel-frog.itch.io/  For the graphics, they are more than incredible, are excellent.
